title: Unable to connect to server"/Firewall bug after Champion Select
body:
After doing hero select and trying to load in, my game fails and gives me an error message suggesting I look at my firewall. Yet on my smurf account it all connects without an issue. Can someone please help me fix, I am at my sanitys end.

I have already giving access to league via my firewall etc

replies.body: What ISP are you using, where are you connecting from, and do you have this happen 100% of the time?

>After doing hero select and trying to load in
>After doing hero select
>hero select

You a vet?

Anyway, is your main account and your smurf on the same region?
